attributes.action: Recognise the astronomer Sir Patrick Moore as one of the greatest living Britons by pledging to honour him after his death with a full state funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise the astronomer Sir Patrick Moore as one of the greatest living Britons by pledging now to honour him after his death with a full state funeral. A list of other true British heroes who's achievements are on par with Sir Patrick's should be very very short.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
